iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.keygenerators

Class PKCS11EcbModeKeyDerivationSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.spec.PKCS11Spec
      • iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.keygenerators.PKCS11KeyGenerationSpec
        • iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.keygenerators.PKCS11KeyDerivationSpec
          • iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.keygenerators.PKCS11EcbModeKeyDerivationSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec, java.security.spec.KeySpec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PKCS11AesCbcKeyDerivationSpec, PKCS11DesCbcKeyDerivationSpec

    public class PKCS11EcbModeKeyDerivationSpec
extends PKCS11KeyDerivationSpec
    Has to be used for specifying a datablob which is then encrypted by the given basekey to form a new key as specified in the keyTemplate. This Spec is used by the key derivation mechanisms in ECB mode.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.provider.spec.PKCS11Spec
